tasks.tar-all: deno task tar-mac && deno task tar-win && deno task tar-linux
tasks.compile-win: deno compile --allow-all --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --v8-flags=--max-old-space-size=8000 --include src/actions/overwrite.worker.ts --output dist/win/in/cndi.exe main.ts
tasks.compile-linux: deno compile --allow-all --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --v8-flags=--max-old-space-size=8000 --include src/actions/overwrite.worker.ts --output dist/linux/in/cndi main.ts
tasks.compile-mac: deno compile --allow-all --target x86_64-apple-darwin --v8-flags=--max-old-space-size=8000 --include src/actions/overwrite.worker.ts --output dist/mac/in/cndi main.ts
tasks.compile-all: deno task compile-win && deno task compile-linux && deno task compile-mac
tasks.clean-mac: rm dist/mac/in/cndi || true && rm dist/release-archives/cndi-mac.tar.gz || true
tasks.clean-win: rm dist/win/in/cndi.exe || true && rm dist/release-archives/cndi-win.tar.gz || true
tasks.clean-linux: rm dist/linux/in/cndi || true && rm dist/release-archives/cndi-linux.tar.gz || true
tasks.clean-dist: deno task clean-mac && deno task clean-win && deno task clean-linux
tasks.build: deno lint && deno fmt && deno task clean-dist && deno task compile-all && deno task tar-all
tasks.build-mac: deno lint && deno fmt && deno task clean-dist && deno task compile-mac
tasks.build-linux: deno lint && deno fmt && deno task clean-dist && deno task compile-linux
tasks.build-win: deno lint && deno fmt && deno task clean-dist && deno task compile-win
